name: curls-and-contemplation-epub
description: A Stylist's Interactive Journey Journal - EPUB validation and build tools

scripts.lint: npm run validate && npm run validate:assets
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && echo '✅ Build completed successfully'
scripts.build:epub: npm run format && npm run validate && npm run validate:toc && npm run test && npm run device:test && scripts/build-epub.sh
scripts.build:full: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run validate:toc && npm run validate:multi-format && npm run optimize:dry-run && npm run device:test && scripts/build-epub.sh dist/curls-and-contemplation.full.epub && echo '✅ Full build completed successfully'
scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:regression
scripts.typecheck: echo '✅ No TypeScript files to check'
scripts.ci: npm run build && npm run metrics
scripts.ci:full: npm run build:full && npm run metrics
scripts.pre-commit: npm run format && npm run lint

author: Curls & Contemplation
